text: My friend just committed suicide  His name was Zach  We met many months ago on discord to play a fun multiplayer game with each other and played many times before realizing we both had a lot of the same interests Just like me he wanted to be a pilot  We both had a passion for aviation  and we flew together on our flight simulators all the time  We even had plans to fly from Honolulu to London online together in one day just for fun It seemed like he had his life going for him too  He had a girlfriend of like   years  He had plans to go into the Air Force and become a pilot  He even had a job interview in Las Vegas at Gordon Ramsay s kitchen He had to return his pc a few days ago to the place he rented it from so I haven t talked with him in a few days which almost makes matters a little worse  The last thing we talked about was making plans to play a new game that had just came out together when he got his pc back  Its an add on for the game we met on  and we had even talked about how amazing it would be if it got added a while ago His girlfriend just let me know on discord what had happened  She told me they went out a few days and he even got me a   gift card and he told his girlfriend he wants us to play some games  she could also tell something was wrong when he said that The worst thing is I could tell there was something wrong  I didn t know what it was I just don t know how to feel cause it seemed like everything was so amazing  It all seems surreal  and I don t know what to think about it all   I never thought I d meet someone who had pretty much all the same interests as me and then just like that I don t again Sorry for the clutter in the feed and thanks for reading

text: I want my suicide to seem accidentalI am only stopped from suicide because of the guilt I feel when I think of my family  However the pain worsens every day and I find myself closer and closer to just doing something and giving in  I want a way to kill myself in which it looks accidental  so that it seems more of a tragic accident than a suicide  I understand it will still hurt my family but perhaps their grief will be different if they assume it was accidental death  There won t be the guilt on their behalf that they  didn t help me  or whatever   I live alone in a small studio apartment and there isn t really anything I can do accidentally though  My oven is electric and starting a fire would risk the lives of my entire building which isn t something I could bring myself to do  Electrocution is something that i m afraid of due to the pain  and there aren t many ways I could go about it that aren t extremely stupid and obvious  I have quite a large shower so an accident is possible but I have trouble working out anything efficient Perhaps the only efficient way to look accidental is from outside  I can t swim  so falling into any fast flowing water is pretty deadly to me however it would be difficult for me to access anything like this and be able to go forward with facing my phobia of water as well as drowning  Being hit by a HGV is possible since I live near some high speed roads but I feel guilty for the trauma I would cause to others  Same applies to  falling  off a train platform It seems like I am too concerned about others to go through with anything  but I feel like I need to be selfish  I don t know what options I have left
summary: I want my suicide to seem accidental. I live alone in a small studio apartment and there is nothing I can do accidentally. I can't swim and I have a phobia of water. I don't know what options I have left.
cleaned: want suicide accidental live small studio apartment accidentally not swim phobia water not know option leave
